message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a bit more, you take a bit less.  We both win something.
Alice, your offer was a bit too greedy. Let's split it closer to the middle this time. I'm feeling generous.
Bob, let's be realistic. This is my counter-offer. It's better to compromise now before inflation eats away at the value even more.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere.  I'm coming down a bit, you come up a bit, and let's close this deal before the money shrinks even further.
